short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filters table content based on user input and saves time searching for rows with specific data

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Once installed the extension works right away. No need to activate it.

InstantTableFilter is a free and lightweight and easy-to-use extension. It lets you search and filter the content of HTML tables on almost any webpage in real time. With this extension, you can quickly locate the info you need in large tables without having to scroll or manually search through the data. 

How it works:

Simply type your search keyword, and the extension will instantly display only the rows that contain the search term, hiding the irrelevant rows.

InstantTableFilter is perfect for users who regularly work with data-heavy websites, researchers who need to find specific data in tables, and anyone who wants to improve their browsing experience with more efficient table navigation.

Key features:

* Real-time table filtering
* Compatible with all websites containing HTML tables
* Easy installation and activation with no configuration required
* Minimal impact on browsing performance

Icon by: Pictogrammers Team

Warning: may interfere the view of some webpages you visit due to heavy HTML and CSS code they was built on. 

Reporting: Please make sure to report any issues you experience with the extension
